title: How to Get Everyone Talking about You and Your Brand, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO238
itunes:title: How to Get Everyone Talking about You and Your Brand, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO238
description: How do you get everyone to talk about you & your brand? A lot of people out there are trying hard to convince me to post about their product or snap a photo of me wearing their swag. They are handing out thousands of t-shirts to influencers & others to get a mention on social media. The truth is there's a way to get people to automatically, naturally, enthusiastically promote your brand, your product, your service...YOU.  How do you do that? Listen to this episode to find out.

The truth is there's a way to get people to automatically, naturally, enthusiastically promote your brand, your product, your service...YOU.  How do you do that? Listen to this episode to find out.
